ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do such people not realise that they will be raised up
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do they not think they will be raised (to life) again
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do they not realise that they will be raised to life
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do they not realize that they will be resurrected
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: What! Do they not expect that they will be raised?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Do they not think that they will be resurrected,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Do not these think that they shall be raised again
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Do those not think that they shall be raised up
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Do such (men) not consider that they will be raised again
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do such people not realize that they will be raised up,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Imagine such men not that they shall be raised up?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do they not know that they will be resurrected
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Do they not think that they will be called to account?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Think they not that they will be resurrected (for reckoning),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do they not think that they will be resurrected
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do these not know that they will be resurrected?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Do they not think that they will be resurrected
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:4] Do such [individuals] not know for certain (alā indicates an interrogative of rebuke) that they will be resurrected
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Do such (men)) those who deal in fraud in weight and measurement (not consider) not know and believe (that they will be raised again) brought back to life
